name: Up or Down?
description:
Up or Down? is a 2D Platformer Video game where you won't be able to remember the angles!

Gameplay: Your gravity is determined by the angles of the floor you're on.

Story: NOTHING AT ALL

Difficulty: Medium

Game Length: Extremely short.

Credits
  • Game: SPOICAT
  • Sound Effects: SPOICAT
  • Music: jhaeka
  • The Sprites and Tileset: Kenney's Scribble Platformer (Modified)
  • Fonts: Tiny
Tools and Stuff I've used:
  • Godot Game Engine
  • Aseprite

Anyway, It's also open source so if you are curious about how this was made then go here: https://github.com/SPOICAT/up-or-down
